Desc.eng: This visit is merely a protocol, Fabricator-General. For now. Tell me about your Forge World.
Accepting the facts isn't optional for my kind, Inquisitor.
I hope you will use Uther's secrets wisely.
You will find our achievements satisfactory.
It is always an immeasurable delight to meet an anointed Inquisitor of the Holy Ordos. How may Forge World Thule assist you?
Inquisitor: About the Machine Spirit of the Martyr...

Thule, as a planet-size Manufactorum, is currently operating at 97% efficiency. Our devotion to the Imperium can be measured by our Production Grade, which was upgraded to I-Secundi 34.8 Terran Years ago. These facts can be verified in the archives of the Adeptus Administratum.

I am fully aware of the rumours surrounding my Forge World, Inquisitor. Tech-heresy, radical experiments, Xenarite sects... these nonsensical claims are undermining our efforts to fulfil the will of the Omnissiah.
There is nothing to discuss about that particular topic, Inquisitor. The choice you have made is irreversible. Any further dwelling on the matter would be unwise and unproductive.

You have made the logical choice, Inquisitor. It goes without saying that I respect your authority, but I also respect your logic and calculation. The experiments with the Digital Apotheosis protocol are progressing as we speak.
I'm glad you accept my decision.
